title: नासा के अपोलो १६ की थर्मल इमेज, विक्रम लैंडर की थर्मल इमेज के नाम से फैलाई जा रही है
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) Chief, K Sivan to ANI:We've found the location of #VikramLander on lunar surface&orbiter has clicked a thermal image of Lander. But there is no communication yet. We are trying to have contact. It will be communicated soon. #Chandrayaan2 pic.twitter.com/1MbIL0VQCo
